Dependency Information

Apache Maven

<dependency>
  <groupId>com.github.wix-maven</groupId>
  <artifactId>wix-maven-plugin</artifactId>
  <version>0.3.0</version>
  <type>maven-plugin</type>
</dependency>

Apache Buildr

'com.github.wix-maven:wix-maven-plugin:maven-plugin:0.3.0'

Apache Ivy

<dependency org="com.github.wix-maven" name="wix-maven-plugin" rev="0.3.0">
  <artifact name="wix-maven-plugin" type="maven-plugin" />
</dependency>

Groovy Grape

@Grapes(
@Grab(group='com.github.wix-maven', module='wix-maven-plugin', version='0.3.0')
)

Gradle/Grails

compile 'com.github.wix-maven:wix-maven-plugin:0.3.0'

Scala SBT

libraryDependencies += "com.github.wix-maven" % "wix-maven-plugin" % "0.3.0"

Leiningen

[com.github.wix-maven/wix-maven-plugin "0.3.0"]
